item.title:
Matt Czuchry joins the cast of ‘AMERICAN HORROR STORY: DELICATE’ starring Emma Roberts, Kim Kardashian, Cara Delevingne, Michaela Jaé Rodriguez and Annabelle Dexter-Jones.
He will play Roberts’ character’s husband on the show.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: Happy birthday to three-time Academy Award winner Daniel Day-Lewis
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Kelly Fremon Craig’s ‘ARE YOU THERE GOD? IT'S ME, MARGARET’ is now playing in theaters.
The film is certified fresh with a score of 99% on Rotten Tomatoes from 111 reviews.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
A ‘BLOOD MERIDIAN’ movie is in the works with John Hillcoat set to direct.
(https://deadline.com/2023/04/new-regency-cormac-mccarthys-blood-meridian-john-hillcoat-1235340998/…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Early footage of Joseph Quinn in A QUIET PLACE: DAY ONE “blew away” execs at Paramount, @Deadline reports.
He is now set to star opposite Paul Mescal, Barry Keoghan and Denzel Washington in GLADIATOR 2.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
‘TRUE DETECTIVE’ creator Nic Pizzolatto to write the upcoming ‘BLADE’ movie starring Mahershala Ali, Mia Goth and Delroy Lindo.
(https://hollywoodreporter.com/movies/movie-news/marvels-blade-nabs-true-detective-creator-1235405915/…)
